Compares a {{tt|basic_const_iterator}} with another value.

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

{{c|I}} satisfies {{c|/*different-from*/&lt;basic_const_iterator&gt;}} if {{c|std::same_as&lt;I, basic_const_iterator&lt;Iter&gt;&gt;}} is false.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|s|a sentinel for {{tt|Iter}}}}
{{par|y|a value to compare with}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|1=base() == s}}
@2@ {{c|1=base() &lt; y.base()}}
@3@ {{c|1=base() &gt; y.base()}}
@4@ {{c|1=base() &lt;= y.base()}}
@5@ {{c|1=base() &gt;= y.base()}}
@6@ {{c|1=base() &lt;=&gt; y.base()}}
@7@ {{c|1=base() &lt; y}}
@8@ {{c|1=base() &gt; y}}
@9@ {{c|1=base() &lt;= y}}
@10@ {{c|1=base() &gt;= y}}
@11@ {{c|1=base() &lt;=&gt; y}}

===Notes===
Overload {{vl|1}} can be used to compare two {{tt|basic_const_iterator&lt;Iter&gt;}} values if {{tt|Iter}} models {{c|sentinel_for&lt;Iter&gt;}}.
